requirements.summary: Remove AMONGSTT token entry from the DEFAULT_TOKENS array in frontend/src/lib/tokenConfig.ts, keeping the remaining 10 tokens intact
acceptanceCriteria: AMONGSTT token is no longer present in DEFAULT_TOKENS array
All other 10 tokens remain in the whitelist unchanged
Token configuration loads correctly without AMONGSTT

file_operations.description: Remove the AMONGSTT token object from the DEFAULT_TOKENS array while preserving all other 10 tokens (JewNomicaN, GreedyJEW, HEBROID, ASC, RPR, PLR, ARK, Schmeckles, MKS, TriForce, DeerChickenn) in their current order and configuration

requirements.summary: Verify that existing localStorage token configurations containing AMONGSTT are handled gracefully, allowing users who previously added AMONGSTT to continue seeing it until they manually remove it
acceptanceCriteria: Existing localStorage configurations with AMONGSTT continue to work
No errors occur when loading saved configurations that include AMONGSTT
Users can manually remove AMONGSTT through the token configuration interface if desired

file_operations.description: Review the loadTokenConfig and saveTokenConfig functions to ensure they handle localStorage data containing AMONGSTT gracefully without throwing errors or filtering it out, maintaining backward compatibility with existing user configurations
